resources.string: Don\'t you have an account yet? Sign Up

To get started, either create a new game code or join a session with the code provided by your friend. In this game, both players will see 15 faces and names. Each of you will have a secret target player. Take turns asking yes/no questions to narrow down the list. When you are confident about your guess, type in the full name of your target player to make your guess. You can also mark off players you’ve ruled out—don’t worry, you can unmark them if you change your mind. The game ends when one of you successfully guesses the other’s target player. Ready to test your deduction skills and have fun? Let’s play!

Remember the prizes that you get after a great performance on all the other games? Select your football formation and fill each position using those players that you’ve earned. Each player has unique qualities, and you’ll earn bonus points by placing them in the positions they play in real life. Complete your squad and submit your score to see how you rank on the leaderboards. Ready to build your ultimate team and climb to the top? Let’s get started!

Test your knowledge with 10 random trivia questions, each featuring 4 possible answers. You’ll have a timer for each question that resets when you move to the next one. Answer correctly to increase your score; incorrect answers will show up in red while the correct answer turns green. Get more than 8 questions right to win an awesome prize! Ready to challenge yourself and have fun? Let’s go!

Start by creating or joining a game with a code. This classic game gets a twist: the first row lists countries, and the first column features football clubs. To make your move, type in the name of a player who fits both the country and the club criteria for the box you select. You have a limited time per turn—exceed it and the turn passes to the other player. The game ends as a draw if 20 turns are reached. Ready to test your football knowledge and strategy? Let’s play!

In this exciting game, you’ll tackle a random question with 10 possible correct answers. You start with 3 lives: get an answer wrong, and you lose one. Type in half of a name or use lowercase letters; if it is close enough, you will still get credit, but the full answer is always the best bet. Answer 8 or more questions correctly to win a fantastic prize! Run out of lives and the game ends. Ready to play? Let’s see how many correct answers you can rack up!
